Content: Havoc Unison

Resonators of <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Havoc Unison</color>. 
This effect will deal <color=#7e1f57>Havoc DMG</color> to enemies.
Phase 2 Concerto

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> and <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Bipolar Duet</color>. 
This effect will increase DMG of all Concerto Element by 20% for 12s.
Aero Legato

Resonators of <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> and <color=#46c3d4>Aero </color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Pneumatic Legato</color>. 
This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG by 20% for 15s. Bonus will be preserved if this Resonator is switched and will get another 20% bonus for <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG.
Conducto Legato

Resonators of <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> and <color=#9656d8>Electro</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Conducto Legato</color>. 
This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG by 20% for 15s. Bonus will be preserved if this Resonator is switched and will get another 20% bonus for <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG.
Fusion Legato

Resonators of <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> and <color=#e15226>Fusion</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Fusion Legato</color>. 
This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG by 20% for 15s. Bonus will be preserved if this Resonator is switched and will get another 20% bonus for <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG.
Glacio Legato

Resonators of <color=#7e1f57>Havoc</color> and <color=#1891e7>Glacio</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Condensation Legato</color>. 
This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG by 20% for 15s. Bonus will be preserved if this Resonator is switched and will get another 20% bonus for <color=#b49f50>Resonance Skill</color> DMG.
Spectra polymerization

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Spectra Unison</color>. 
This effect will deal <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra DMG</color> to enemies.
Aero Sustenance

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> and <color=#46c3d4>Aero</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Pnuematic Sustenance</color>. 
This effect will generate stagnant field for a short time and recover 10 Concerto Energy for currently Resonator in battle.
Conducto Sustenance

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> and <color=#9656d8>Conducto</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Conductive Sustenance</color>. 
This effect will generate stagnant field for a short time and recover 10 Concerto Energy for currently Resonator in battle..
Fusion Sustenance

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> and <color=#e15226>Fusion</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Fusion Sustenance</color>. 
This effect will generate stagnant field for a short time and recover 10 Concerto Energy for currently Resonator in battle.
Glacio Sustenance

Resonators of <color=#d4bf5f>Spectra</color> and <color=#1891e7>Glacio</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Condensation Sustenance</color>. 
This effect will generate stagnant field for a short time and recover 10 Concerto Energy for currently Resonator in battle.
Aero Unison
Aero damage done by the whole team increase for 12 seconds. The character that triggers the effect gains resonance energy.
Chill Concerto

Resonators of <color=#9656d8>Conducto</color> and <color=#46c3d4>Aero</color> will trigger Concerto Effect of <color=#b49f50>Conducto Ensemble</color>. 
This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Resonance Liberation</color> DMG by 40% for 12s. Bonus will be removed if the Resonator is switched.

This effect will increase current Resonator in battle's <color=#b49f50>Normal and Heavy Attack</color> DMG by 40% for 12s. Bonus will be removed if the Resonator is switched.
